children.name: DMC Agent
Create quotes based on requests
Follow up on queries from Travel Agents
Respond to queries from Travel Agents
Make amendments to quotes being built
Ensure relevant products are offered to Travel Agents
Support edge case requirements well
Customise quote for case to case basis
Add on the fly inventory to support out-of-system/ non-contracted products
Work smoothly across multiple organisations
Efficiently work with a particular quote
Efficiently locate a particular quote
Quickly understand the context of a quote, even if I am seeing it after a long time or am not the original creator of it.
DMC Supervisor
Manage work for DMC Agents
Be informed of DMC Agent workload and status
Assign/ redistribute enqiries for DMC Agents
Approve price change request created by DMC agent
Reduce operational cost
Reduce manual error by DMC agents (possibly by having some checks in place)
Make DMC Agents more productive
Ensure targets are met
Set targets for my agents
Incentivise/ penalise DMC Agents
Communicate routine disruptions to relevant stakeholders
Use the announcement system to make selective announcements
DMC Owner
Ensure smooth running of the org
See the overall status of things
what is different over and above any business owner
Set targets for my supervisors
Continuous Improvement
Work with allround qualitative and quantitiative feedback to improve business processes
Feed data for pre beats usage so that benchmarks can be calculated
DMC Contracting Team
Be on top of current demand
Be able to see when availability is low or when demand will be more
Build new relationships
Know sources of relevant rates, then find the best among them
Establish contract with new vendors
Monitor bookings on preferred destinations
Get best rates from suppliers/ vendors to ensure higher margins
Negotiate new / renegotiate exisitng contracts
Make rates & availability accessible to the DMC organisation
Be able to easily and correctly load rates manually or via API
Be able to easily verify rates are correct
Be able to manage contracts or info provided by suppliers
Be able to manage information about deals, contacts, promotions etc
Ensure bookings are honored by contracted vendors
Monitor system for confirmations and cancellations
Work with feedback of TAs
Be able to capture rejection reasons from TAs
Be able to see sales trends breakup by TA, product, location, duration etc
DMC Fulfillment Team
Work without errors across multiple systems
Configure automation rules
Automated emails are sent to vendors based on contract details
Establish contract with new vendors
Make bookings (on various other systems and websites)
Be able to keep track of where all bookings have to be made - urls, access etc
Confirm Bookings
Update status of quotes in the system (list and details view with 2 ticks out of which one is for vendor)
Follow up with vendors for confirmations if needed
Ensure smooth operations
Be able to track payments or credit cycles with the vendors
Ensure timely action on reservations (hence need some way to prioritise work)
Keep track of invoices for reconciliation
DMC Grounds Team
Provide the best possible experience to travelers in a city
Keep abreast of traveler movement and schedules by looking at the manifest table
Receive travelers at the airport
Coordinate traveler movement in town with transport and activity providers
whatever else it may take to enable the best possible local experience for the traveler
DMC Admin
Set up and maintain the system for my org
Configure system settings to suit my organisations requirements
Define cities that my DMC operates in and assign Grounds Team Personnel to each city
Take care of monthly payments, extra storage requirements, etc.
Process out agents and supervisors who have left
Define and refine new product categories as needed
TA Agent
Know my customers
Capture client details, past trips, professional info, family info etc so he can give personalized quotes
Provide personalised service
Remind clients before the trip to give a personal touch
Ensure delightful experience across all stages of the trip
Be able to take client feedback post trip or during the trip so his help is noted
Work with DMCs to get best rates
Choose between quotes from multiple DMCs
TA Supervisor
Manage work for DMC Agents
Be informed of DMC Agent workload and status
Assign/ redistribute enqiries for DMC Agents
Approve price change request created by DMC agent
Reduce operational cost
Reduce manual error by DMC agents (possibly by having some checks in place)
Make DMC Agents more productive
Ensure targets are met
Set targets for my agents
Incentivise/ penalise DMC Agents
Communicate routine disruptions to relevant stakeholders
Use the announcement system to make selective announcements
Define rules of engagement for DMCs
Easily define rules for choosing DMCs for booking
